summary: Cable from Mexico City requesting traces and POA for Jorge Antonio Abasolo Garcia, a Cuban industrial engineer with connections to Ernesto "Che" Guevara, and reporting on his brother Gustavo Abasolo, who is anti-Castro and potentially willing to provide information. The cable also mentions Abasolo's planned departure from Cuba and his ex-wife's family connections.
title: MEXI 5620: JORGE ANTONIO ABASOLO GARCIA - Traces and POA Request
